text: WYJR-LP (95.5 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Middlesboro, Kentucky. The station is owned by Middlesboro Board of Education, and airs a classic rock format. The station was assigned the WYJR-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on February 7, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * YJR-LP YJR-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Kentucky Category:Classic rock radio stations in the United States Category:Bell County, Kentucky Category:High school radio stations in the United States
title: WYJR-LP
